video_title: Alon  Muroch (SSV.Labs (SSV.Network)) - Let Validators Do More!
description: With the advent of based sequencing and preconfs, validators will participate in commitments beyond what they do today. We explore utilizing the validator private keys as non-slashable capital to bootstrap out-of-protocol services directly on the L1.
